theDefault:DefaultOrb.NAME: Default Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, draw #b

theDragonkin:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
DESCRIPTION: NL #yBreak : Increase the #yBlock gain of the card that created this by #b

theDragonkin:Infusion.NAME: Infusion
DESCRIPTION: NL #yBreak : Increase the damage of the card that created this by #b

theDragonkin:Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
DESCRIPTION: NL at the start of your turn gain #b

theDragonkin:Blaze.NAME: Blaze
DESCRIPTION: NL at the end of your turn deal #b
damage to a random enemy and apply #b2 #yScorch to a random enemy

theDragonkin:Dragonfire.NAME: Dragonfire
DESCRIPTION: NL at the end of your turn deal #b
damage to a random enemy and gain #b6 #yAuraflame

theDragonkin:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
DESCRIPTION: NL at the end of your turn deal #b
damage to a random enemy and apply #b2 #yVulnerable to a random enemy

theDragonkin:Flame.NAME: Flame
DESCRIPTION: NL After you discard a card gain #b
#yBlock. NL at the start of your turn #yCycle #b2 cards.

theDragonkin:Deflection.NAME: Deflection
DESCRIPTION: NL at the start of your turn gain #b

theDragonkin:Bloodthirst.NAME: Bloodthirst
DESCRIPTION: NL at the start of your turn deal #b
damage to a random enemy 3 times.

theDragonkin:Ward.NAME: Ward
DESCRIPTION: NL at the start of your turn gain #b
[theDragonkin:FireIcon] #yBlock and shuffle a #yBurn into your draw pile.

theDragonkin:Spark.NAME: Spark
DESCRIPTION: NL at the start of your turn draw #b

theDragonkin:Rain.NAME: Rain
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive : At the end of your turn gain #b
Block, and increase this cards Evoke value by #b1

theDragonkin:Fo.NAME: Fo
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive : If you have 2 different #yFrost #Breath Orbs deal #b

theDragonkin:Krah.NAME: Krah
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive : If you have 2 different #yFrost #Breath Orbs deal #b

theDragonkin:Diin.NAME: Diin
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive : If you have 2 different #yFrost #Breath Orbs deal #b

theDragonkin:StormMark.NAME: Mark of Storm
DESCRIPTION: NL at the end of your turn deal #b
to a random enemy to a random enemy twice
